newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy Oct cumulative PSBR 116.3 trln lire.
newsitem.headline: Italy Oct cumulative PSBR 116.3 trln lire.

text.p: Italy's cumulative public sector borrowing requirement was 116.3 trillion lire at end-October 1996 compared with around 116.6 trillion in the same period last year, the Treasury Ministry said in a statement.

It added that Treasury management operations showed a provisional net deficit of around 20.5 trillion lire last month compared with a 24 trillion lire deficit in October 1995. -- Rome newsroom +396 6782501
